auth.firstNameHelper: Gali magacaaga hore sida ku qoran aqoonsigaaga
auth.lastNameHelper: Gali magacaaga dambe sida ku qoran aqoonsigaaga
auth.emailHelper: Emailkan ayaa laguugu soo diri doonaa xaqiijinta boos celinta
auth.phoneHelper: Loogu talagalay xaqiijinta iyo la xiriirka martida
auth.phoneNumberHelper: Waxaan u adeegsan doonaa xaqiijinta iyo la xiriirka martida
auth.profilePictureHelper: Ikhtiyaari: Ku dar sawir si martidu kuu aqoonsato
auth.passwordHelper: Ugu yaraan 8 xaraf oo isugu jira xuruufo iyo tirooyin
auth.confirmPasswordHelper: Mar kale geli furaha sirta si loo xaqiijiyo
auth.termsHelper: Waa inaad ogolaataa shuruudaha si aad u sii wadato
auth.registrationSuccess: Akoon si guul leh ayaa loo abuuray!
auth.registrationFailed: Diiwaangelintu waa fashilantay. Fadlan isku day mar kale.
auth.auth0LoginFailed: Soo galiddu waa fashilantay. Fadlan isku day mar kale.
auth.ssoSignupInfo: Waxaan horey ugu buuxinay xogtaada akoonkaaga bulshada. Fadlan dhameystir meelaha ka dhiman.
auth.ssoPasswordOptional: Ikhtiyaari: U deji furaha sirta akoonkaaga
auth.ssoPasswordHelper: Ikhtiyaari: U deji furaha sirta si aad u isticmaasho galitaanka caadiga ah iyo isku xirka akoonnada
auth.accountLinkingRequired: Isku xirka akoon ayaa loo baahan yahay
auth.accountLinkingDescription: Waxaan helnay akoon hore oo leh email {{email}}. Ma rabtaa inaad ku xirtid akoonkaaga cusub ee {{newProvider}}?
auth.verifyPasswordDescription: Fadlan geli furaha sirta si loo xaqiijiyo in kani yahay akoonkaaga oo aad ku xirtid {{newProvider}}.
auth.passwordRequired: Furaha sirta waa loo baahan yahay
auth.invalidPassword: Furaha sirta waa khalad. Fadlan isku day mar kale.
auth.accountLinkedSuccessfully: Akoon si guul leh ayaa loo xidhay!
auth.accountLinkingFailed: Isku xirka akoonku wuu fashilmay. Fadlan isku day mar kale.

validation.emailInvalid: Fadlan geli cinwaan email sax ah
validation.passwordTooShort: Furaha sirta waa inuu ahaadaa ugu yaraan 8 xaraf
validation.firstNameRequired: Magaca hore waa loo baahan yahay
validation.lastNameRequired: Magaca dambe waa loo baahan yahay
validation.phoneRequired: Lambarka telefoonka waa loo baahan yahay
validation.passwordComplexity: Furaha sirta waa inuu ka koobnaadaa xuruufo waaweyn, yaryar, tiro iyo calaamad gaar ah

avatar.photoLibraryPermissionDenied: Ogolaanshaha maktabadda sawirada waa la diiday

passwordManager.savePrompt: Qalabkaaga ayaa ku weydiin doona in si ammaan ah loo keydiyo furaha sirta
passwordManager.autofillHint: Isticmaal Face ID/Touch ID ama maamulaha furaha sirta ee qalabkaaga si aad u buuxiso xogta
passwordManager.biometricHint: Fur aqoonsiga biometric ee dejinta qalabkaaga si aad si ammaan ah u buuxiso
